Pre-Game Insights: Wales continue life without Gareth Bale, who retired from international football, and are eager to make amends for a heavy 4-0 loss to Slovakia.
New boss Craig Bellamy has included Ollie Cooper, Mark Harris, and Karl Darlow in the squad.
Turkey is high on confidence after reaching the EURO 2024 quarter-finals and features Real Madrid rising star Arda Gular.
A low-scoring affair is anticipated based on previous meetings between the two sides.
